gov.nasa.jpf.listener

Class ErrorTraceGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.GenericProperty
      • gov.nasa.jpf.PropertyListenerAdapter
        • gov.nasa.jpf.listener.ErrorTraceGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JPFListener, Property, PublisherExtension, SearchListener, Printable, VMListener

    public class ErrorTraceGenerator
extends PropertyListenerAdapter
implements PublisherExtension
    A lightweight listener to generate the error trace by printing the program instructions at transition boundaries. The idea is to have a shorter trace output that only shows the choices
